turns.text: I have an older son yeah He doesnt have any children yet though
turns.label: na

turns.text: Uh hes thirty-seven and I dont know if hes ever going to have any or not but I do have some neighbor kids lots of little neighbor kids
turns.label: sd

turns.text: That - I go out and uh I play ball with them You know its because like this one that lives right next door her mother does some work at home --
-- and it just seems like she doesnt have any time for her Which is kind of sad you know
turns.label: sd

turns.text: So the kids are kind of hungry for someone to play with them So I will go out and play catch with them or you know we ha- let the dogs outside and they will roll around on the ground and play with the dogs but uh actually I do think that the parents should have you know little bit more time to spend with their kids
turns.label: sd

turns.text: I would think so When you - when when your son was at home did you uh working - Did you work or were you able to stay at home with him
turns.label: aa

turns.text: No when my son was at home I I did work and then he went to baby sitter that this lady had about five other kids that she baby sat you know --
turns.label: nn

turns.text: -- but we always had our days off together and we went camping on vacations So we had lot of time together that way you know
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Yeah Well when my mom uh - when I was growing up my mom worked too but she worked nights --
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- and uh as nurse and so she was always home for us --

-- and I always I really appreciated that Having her there when I was you know when I came home from school and when I worked but now when I look back at it it must have been really difficult thing that she did --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Oh yeah Well I am sure it was you know But uh I dont know what the families are going to come to now days because they there just doesnt seem like they do have time for their kids Because most most of them the father and mother both work you know
turns.label: aa

turns.text: So its really rough Uh I have one neighbor thats uh the father is fireman and he works like four days on and it seems like he is suppose to come home for like three or four days but he cant make enough as fireman to support his family you know So hes got second job
turns.label: sv

turns.text: So hes you know hes not home very often
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And thats you know - the kids I know miss that
Uh family without father its its uh really hard thing
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Yeah you know and I dont know I I suppose they are trying to get through to them that well daddy is not home because you know he is out working trying to make some money for you know we can buy you this bike and that toy and so forth you know
turns.label: aa

turns.text: Kids I think would much rather have dad there than the toy anyway
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Oh I am sure they would you know So are you planning on to having any children or -
turns.label: aa

turns.text: uh-huh But we are - we just got married like like December so we are going to wait year
turns.label: b

turns.text: Thats what my uh daughter-in-law told me That they were going to have kids probably after two years of marriage
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And they will be married nine years this year So I dont know Shes nurse you know and uh she has brothers and sisters that has got lots of little kids so maybe they just decided that uh if they wanted to have kids around the house they would just you know call one of their sisters or brothers up and tell them to send the kids over for the night
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Well We really want to have family We feel like that that couple you know you are not giving enough of yourself and --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- you should you should be sharing your family
And giving your values you know making something better of the world by raising up good kids --

Give them give them an edge but we feel like like the first year needs to be devoted to uh making the family the couple strong --

turns.text: -- and secure in their love for each other
But then family is is definitely high priority

turns.text: Yeah uh do you plan on staying home after you have your children or do you do you work or what
turns.label: b

turns.text: Well well I uh I am in I am in different situation I am missionary --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- and I am home on furlough It called like - I have worked for four years in Africa and I come home for year
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And then we go back for four years But my husband and I will do the same job and we will be living in in Africa and we will be working together
turns.label: sd

turns.text: So uh we will we will share the job of raising the family I mean as mother I will have certain responsibilities that he might not necessarily have but still we will share that job
turns.label: sd
